gridsystems.name: Main 'wide' grid
gridsystems.description: Main project's default gridsystem with 14 columns registered as gl-wide. It'll projected to be used over 1305px wide.

gridsystems.name: Main 'normal' grid
gridsystems.description: Main project's "normal" gridsystem with 10 columns registered as gl-normal. It'll projected to be used under 1306px wide and over 929px.

gridsystems.name: Main 'Mobile' grid
gridsystems.description: Main project's "mobile" gridsystem with 4 columns registered as gl-mobile. It'll projected to be used under 930px.
